mng: hair, feather, down, wool, mildew, mold, coarse or semifinished, young, raw, careless, unthinking, nervous, scared, (of currency) to devalue or depreciate, classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

exm.mng: (of an animal) appearance or color of coat
to lose hair or feathers, to molt, depilation, to shave
pornographic film, unedited film (old), fur color
